Professional web development since 2010

Website maintenance of creative studio Caveat

Stack: Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, SCSS, Jest, Typescript, Node.js, Nest.js, Express.js, React, Mobx, Tree.js, Canvas, Microservice architecture, Fat client, 3D, 2D

Usually, we receive your request, then we clarify details with you. Then we arrange the first introductory meeting or call for better understanding of your request. After that we provide estimate of the time and terms of work.

It is so great to see you here! And we suppose you stop by recomendation of friends or co-workers!
